formattedAddress: 8 w 58th St, 5th Ave near, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 8 w 58th St, 5th Ave near, New York, NY 10019, USA

editorialSummary.text: Tours of iconic Central Park in a "bicycle taxi," taking in Belvedere Castle, the Met & other sites.

originalText.text: My son and I had a great pedicab ride today thru Central Park! We did the hour long tour and felt like we saw some great sites (next time I’d love to do the 2 hour tour). A lot of ppl told me to walk or bike instead of do a pedi cab tour, but we had been walking all day and it was nice to sit and relax (plus it was a super hot day). Our driver had lots of fun and interesting facts to tell us about the park, and we stopped several times to take pictures and walk around. It was a nice tour and I’d do it again, especially with my teenager who sometimes is not that into walking! :)

originalText.text: Wow! This pedicab tour exceeded all of our expectations. Victor was a great tour guide and very knowledgeable! We got to get out at many sightseeing spots and take photos. We never felt rushed and really enjoyed our time going through Central Park! Cannot recommend enough.

text.text: Wow! This pedicab tour exceeded all of our expectations. Victor was a great tour guide and very knowledgeable! We got to get out at many sightseeing spots and take photos. We never felt rushed and really enjoyed our time going through Central Park! Cannot recommend enough.

originalText.text: Alexander was our driver for our tour of Central Park. He was excellent and very knowledgeable. He took the time to tell the history and film location of different areas, and took lots of lovely photos of us in a few locations. Would highly recommend Alexander and Central Park pedicab tours.

text.text: Alexander was our driver for our tour of Central Park. He was excellent and very knowledgeable. He took the time to tell the history and film location of different areas, and took lots of lovely photos of us in a few locations. Would highly recommend Alexander and Central Park pedicab tours.

originalText.text: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!Laramie is a great guy and  gave us a really excellent quick tour of Central Park. No hard sell. We hadn’t planned on a pedicab tour and didn’t think we had time as we had tickets to the Rockettes in an hour. But he gave us such a great price, $45 pp for a forty five minute tour and customized his tour for us and even guaranteed that he would deliver us the Radio City Music Hall in time for our show!!!and he did!!! That was an extra 10 minutes!!He is incredibly knowledgeable and engaging about the park, its history, celebrities and famous sites. He’s been doing this for over twenty years and he really knows the city and everything about the park. We wish we had time left in our trip to do the 3 hour tour with him and see every single thing in the park but that will have to wait until our next trip to NYC!!!HIGHLY RECOMMEND !!!

originalText.text: Me and my cousin had a 1hr tour with them today. We were lucky to have Victor as our guide. We pre booked the night before as lots of available slots. We had a fantastic time. No blaring music like the others and fantastic price (others charging $4 per minute). Victor gave lots of information about all aspects of the park and gave us time to get out and look and even took lots of photos for us!! I absolutely highly recommend!!
